titleStmt.title: The bond-man an antient storie. As it hath been often acted with good allowance, at the Cock-pit in Drury-lane: by the most excellent princesse, the Lady Elizabeth her Seruants. By Phillip Massinger.
titleStmt.author: Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw: Allde, for Iohn Harison and Edward Blackmore, and are to be sold at the great south dore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the great south dore of Pauls
